sentences.sContent: She excels all of us at tennis.
sentences.sContent_eng: She excels all of us at tennis.
sentences.sCn: 她的网球比我们打得都好。

sentences.sContent: I like his smile and his tennis!
sentences.sContent_eng: I like his smile and his tennis!
sentences.sCn: 我喜欢他的微笑和他的网球！

sentences.sContent: If she decides to go with her sister instead, then I can play tennis with you.
sentences.sContent_eng: If she decides to go with her sister instead, then I can play tennis with you.
sentences.sCn: 要是她决定和她姐姐一起出去，那我就能和你去打网球。

phrases.pCn: 肘部发炎；网球运动员常见的肘伤

trans.tranOther: a game for two people or two pairs of people who use  rackets  to hit a small soft ball backwards and forwards over a net
